captions.text:
Please tell me
you speak english.

The words that are coming
out of my mouth?

First, I get
a bullshit assignment,

Come on, man.
My ride's over here.
Put your bag in the back.

What the hell
you think this is?

Captain, I don't think
this is funny.

title: Do You Understand the Words That Are Coming Out of My Mouth? - Rush Hour (1/5) Movie CLIP (1998) HD

comments.text:
Those calling Chris Tucker racist against Jackie Chan in the movie are 
stupid as heck dude. Jackie Chan attended to the comedy people. So what 
makes that so racist? Jackie Chan may not know much English, but he isn't 
stupid. All this you see here is script that Jackie Chan signed up for not 
once, but 3 times! Chris Tucker is not racist in fact the Rush Hour Series 
brought Chris Tucker and Jackie Chan to be very good friends. Jackie Chan 
trained Chris Tucker karate for the next 2 films. Yes Chris Tucker still 
did bad, but it was part of the script and the comedy. I swear people smh. 
Get your shit together seriously!﻿

You are absolutely right. He's not deaf. Its not that he can't hear you, he 
doesn't speak english. He's not stupid, he's not deaf, he just does not 
understand english. (I know that in the movie he can, but you see this all 
the time overseas) Once sawe an american in Japan go into this Hotel and 
say "My name is **** I would like a room please" the lass behind the 
counter asked him in english to wait while she gets someone who speaks 
better english. He just said it again, really really loud. Ugh.
